Jargon Term: 2 weeks of worsening breathing, with cough
viral upper respiratory illness, in the setting of your considerable underlying lung disease
follow-up with your pulmonary doctor as below, to consider a bronchoscopy as an outpatient
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - Upcoming Schedules - Specialist appointment

Jargon Term: 7 day course of an antibiotic, levaquin

increased regimen of prednisone 60mg once daily, which will be tapered by 20 mg every 3 days (so take 60mg once daily for 3 days, then take 40mg once daily every for 3 days, then take 20mg once daily continuously until instructed to stop by your pulmonary doctor or primary care physician)
